title: How to get day name in a date in node js
body:
I have a date like this

2017-06-23 and my desired output is

Friday June 23 2017

 v.npi.appointment_dates[j] = date.toLocaleString('en-US', {year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' });

But because of the day: 'numeric' I am missing the day name.It cosumed almost 3 hours.Can anyone please help me.Thanks.
